title: The Owners
description: A group of friends think they found the perfect easy score - an empty house with a safe full of cash. But when the elderly couple that lives there comes home early, the tables are suddenly turned. As a deadly game of cat and mouse ensues, the would-be thieves must fight to save themselves from a nightmare they could never have imagined.

reviews.text: Is a 2020 horror film featuring an absurd comedy. The film is neither funny nor scary. The actors and characters are so carefully selected that they are all antipathetic. It's one of the most annoying and time-wasting movies I've ever seen. A group of 4 people are going to rob a mansion. They find a safe November, but they can't open it. Then they are waiting for the old couple who owns the house. They're getting into trouble on their own trying to scare them off. It's a really ridiculous movie.There are scenes in the film that contain sexuality in places.
Fantastic horror film, well worth a watch!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
